segments.text: I watch the woman with a mix of admiration and concern.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so content in her small world of dish drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But how can she be so oblivious to everything happening around her?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being mischievous, and part of me wants to scold them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet another part of me finds it kind of endearing—those innocent little faces.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t shake the feeling that something is bound to go wrong, though.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They should be enjoying the cookies outside in the sun, not risking their safety in here.
segments.speaker: PAR
